module.title: Resource: Pages
module.log: Starting this module as Info:Pages.
Later, the extraction to Resource:Pages happened.
This version log is the reduced progress of the former module.
Added page content format.
Extended database table by timestamps.
Merged SQL updates into SQL install script.
Add new page status "deactivated" and avoid access.
Support sitemap information in model.
Support subpage resolution of module controlled pages.
Allow page resolution of empty node page and redirect to first child.
Redirect module page only if module path is not within linked page.
Support page icons.
Change module column to controller and action.
Support page access.
Add language support using module Resource:Localization.
Identify page by controller and action.
Cleanup and documentation.
Improve dispatching.
Refactor page detection to work by recursion.
Add component page type.
Extend logic class by method hasPages.
Migrate core of Info:Pages to Resource:Pages.
Add prototype of config based page model.
Refactor page detection to be more stable.
Extend model by fullpath for faster dispatching.
Add dummy model for pages defined in modules.
Add page entity and use in logic class.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>pages` ( `pageId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `parentId` int(10) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `type` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0', `scope` int(10) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `rank` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `identifier` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `fullpath` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `controller` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `action` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `access` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'public', `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `content` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `format` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'HTML', `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `keywords` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `changefreq` varchar(8) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'weekly', `priority` float UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0.5', `icon` varchar(30) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `template` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`pageId`), KEY `parentId` (`parentId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `type` (`type`), KEY `scope` (`scope`), KEY `identifier` (`identifier`), KEY `fullpath` (`fullpath`), KEY `controller` (`controller`), KEY `action` (`action`), KEY `access` (`access`), KEY `format` (`format`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
